# Gradle Wrapper #

<https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/gradle_wrapper.html>

Running the Wrapper task

```shell
$ gradle wrapper
```

Tasks

```shell
$ ./gradlew tasks
```

Version check

```shell
$ ./gradlew --version
```

Upgrading the Wrapper version

```shell
$ ./gradlew wrapper --gradle-version 5.5.1
```
